relatedRecords.name: iOSDevUK
relatedRecords.description: iOSDevUK started in 2011 as the UK’s first conference for iPhone developers, and has attracted hundreds of developers to Aberystwyth each year since then. It runs from 4pm on Monday until 1pm on Thursday, followed by an optional Hack. It is very much a community event, with a broad range of spea…

relatedRecords.name: heise MacDev
relatedRecords.description: Die heise MacDev beschäftigt sich mit allen Aspekten der Software-Entwicklung für Apple-Geräte, also Mac, iPhone, iPad, aber auch Apple Watch und Apple TV.

relatedRecords.name: FlutterConf.by Conference
relatedRecords.description: FlutterConf.by is the first Belarusian conference dedicated to Flutter technology by Google. Organized by local enthusiasts together with SUP, it’s aimed to encourage knowledge and ideas sharing thus spreading out the use of the technology in the country.
